ModMetaData.name: WM Medivac
ModMetaData.author: Wishmaster
ModMetaData.description: Requires HugsLib. Adds few improvements related to medical care. Medivac Load downed pawns into pods. Enhanced medical bed selection Colonists will try to get to the best medical bed for operation. This means: Bed < Bed with vital monitor < Medical bed with vital monitor < Any non-vanilla bed that's even better. If they don't need tending nor to gain immunity however, they will leave the best medical beds free. Emergency: If your pawn needs urgent tending (severe blood loss), he will find the closest bed instead.
